Quickstrike:






Quickstrike heard an explosion, and it sounded like it was coming from the 
CR chamber. His eyes lit up, and the first think that came to his mind was: 
Hell Beast!

He brusted out of the chamber door, limping, and fell to the floor. He 
landed on his belly and slowly turned. But instead of seeing the gruesome 
figure of Hell Beast, he saw the slender, attractive figure of Black 
Arachnia. He stared at her, with both hatred and attraction.

"Sugarbot?"

He was still dazed.
